video.title: Breakout
video.synopsis: The only thing that can match the guts and ingenuity of these “breakout” prison stars is the skill of the authorities doggedly pursuing them.

episodes.synopsis: Authorities launch the biggest manhunt in U.S. history when George Rivas leads six fellow inmates on a daring escape from Texas's Connally Unit.
episodes.title: The Texas Seven

episodes.synopsis: Six inmates escape from Pittsburgh's maximum-security Western Penitentiary, but they don't enjoy their freedom for long.
episodes.title: The Pittsburgh Six

episodes.synopsis: Serving an 80-year sentence, Dennis Hope trains like a marathon runner -- the better to outrun the authorities when he makes his escape.
episodes.title: The Running Man

episodes.synopsis: Numerous escape attempts land Quawntay Adams in a maximum-security jail -- where he manages another escape, this time through a ventilation window.
episodes.title: The Escapist

episodes.synopsis: George Hyatte's wife, a former prison nurse who married him while he was incarcerated, breaks him out, and the pair arouse mayhem across three states.
episodes.title: Prison Romance

episodes.synopsis: John Parsons, who became one of Ohio's most wanted when he killed an off-duty cop, plans to avoid the death penalty by escaping from prison.
episodes.title: Ohio's Most Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Convicted murderers Timothy Vail and Timothy Morgan plot an escape from Elmira Prison via a hole they've chipped in their cell's ceiling.
episodes.title: Through the Roof

episodes.synopsis: After months of gaming the system at the Northern Nevada Correctional Center, Jody Thompson makes his escape via a furniture delivery truck.
episodes.title: Escape to Vegas
